```py
>>> df == 100
 cost  revenue
A  False     True
B  False    False
C   True    False 
```

```py
>>> df.eq(100)
 cost  revenue
A  False     True
B  False    False
C   True    False 
```

```py
>>> df != pd.Series([100, 250], index=["cost", "revenue"])
 cost  revenue
A   True     True
B   True    False
C  False     True 
```

```py
>>> df.ne(pd.Series([100, 300], index=["A", "D"]), axis='index')
 cost  revenue
A  True    False
B  True     True
C  True     True
D  True     True 
```

```py
>>> df == [250, 100]
 cost  revenue
A   True     True
B  False    False
C  False    False 
```

```py
>>> df.eq([250, 250, 100], axis='index')
 cost  revenue
A   True    False
B  False     True
C   True    False 
```

```py
>>> other = pd.DataFrame({'revenue': [300, 250, 100, 150]},
...                      index=['A', 'B', 'C', 'D'])
>>> other
 revenue
A      300
B      250
C      100
D      150 
```

```py
>>> df.gt(other)
 cost  revenue
A  False    False
B  False    False
C  False     True
D  False    False 
```

```py
>>> df.le(df_multindex, level=1)
 cost  revenue
Q1 A   True     True
 B   True     True
 C   True     True
Q2 A  False     True
 B   True    False
 C   True    False 
```
